featured.text: In fact, if it is, it may 37 an injury or muscle strain.

definition.zh_def: 拉緊、扭傷或過度使用的狀態或過程。
definition.en_def: A force or influence that causes deformation or stress; also refers to a condition resulting from excessive tension or injury.
definition.example: He felt a strain in his back after lifting the heavy box.
